Texto: 
routine labs showed anemia
air-contrast be: concentric narrowing “apple core” lesion of the proximal descending colon.  

ct: corresponds to be findings of a concentrically narrowed lesion of the colon without invasion of the abdominal wall or distant metastases.
colon adenocarcinoma
primary colon cancer
metastatic lesion
lymphoma
leiomyoma
leiomyosarcoma
post-inflammatory stricture
34 y.o. woman for screening colonoscopy.  the gi attending was unable to pass the endoscope beyond the descending colon.
